Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A Node manage a collection of sensors
    Author:
    Daniele Carta, Cristian C. Spagnuolo
